revised_title: Infra-Red Absorption Spectra of Quartz and Fused Silica
tldr: The authors conducted an experimental study on the infra-red absorption spectra of quartz and fused silica from 1 to 7.5 µm. They examined the absorption coefficients and wave numbers, and their results provide a comprehensive understanding of the spectra of silica and solid materials. The study used a small prism spectrometer and various sources of radiation to measure the transmission and absorption of the specimens.
